feed.title: Social-to-Mealie Releases

entry.title: New release for Social-to-Mealie: v0.8.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added an additional instruction to the Mealie import prompt so it doesn't translate the transcript by @Itay080 in https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/pull/43

New Contributors

  • @Itay080 made their first contribution in https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/pull/43

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/compare/v0.8.3...v0.8.4

entry.title: New release for Social-to-Mealie: Prompt is now customizable
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update addUserPrompt by @GerardPolloRebozado in https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/pull/45
  • fix: :bug: fixed issue with tiktok downloads by @GerardPolloRebozado in https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/pull/47
  • Feat/add user prompt by @GerardPolloRebozado in https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/pull/48
  • feat: :sparkles: Users can now change the prompt by @GerardPolloRebozado in https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/pull/49

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GerardPolloRebozado/social-to-mealie/compare/v0.8.5...v0.9.0
